DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria . All patient nonMRI conditional pacemaker ICDs age 1885 eligible participate . Medical record review confirm date make/model device implant . Ordering physician discus MRI request radiologist , document appropriate alternate image test . Patient must appointment cardiologist/electrophysiologist prior MRI . Banner Health policy standard care guideline involve patient receive MRI 's follow . Exclusion Criteria . Patients exclude MRI base Department Radiology protocol . Additional exclusion criterion include : ICD pacemaker dependent , Pacemaker insert 2002 , Epicardial lead , fracture lead , abandon lead , temporary pacemaker ( postcoronary artery bypass graft temporary epicardial pacing wire acceptable ) , Patient awake unable communicate , Battery voltage elective replacement interval , implant nonMRI conditional device ( pacemaker/ICD ) .
